headline: Social Club Event
subtitle: Weekend Social Club Event
content:
All this weekend, enjoy exclusive in-game benefits as part of our GTA Online Weekend Event.

Deathmatches and Races will be free entry all weekend and look out for 25% discounts on the Adder, the Dinka Double-T and the Buzzard, plus 50% off all Armor vehicle upgrades. Just the right tools to give you the edge in the new Capture Jobs.

In Freemode, Event Crate Drops are back - frequent deliveries, with more than double the usual amount of RP, high-powered weapons and bonus cash.
